title: Star Guardian...Villains?
body: So here's a motley crew of unlikely superteam heroines fighting the bad guys to preserve peace and happiness! But...who are they fighting? Who are the Star Guardians fighting against? :0 WE NEED VILLAINS

All 3 of them i could pay 20 bucks for a new skin. The Guardian of the sands Kha is poop. and Death Blossom is Meh. Mecha is truly his only good skin imo.

dark stars really don't fit thematically though.
They are massive planet devourers,I mean how are the star guardians gonna fight them?In the video you could see the star guardians struggling against nashor,but nashor is nothing compared to the dark stars,nashor would die by merely being close to dark star varus/thresh,simply because of their huge size and gravitational pull.

If anything I could imagine the dark stars being sort of the "bigger bad" of the series,with them staying behind the scenes,similar to how great star is a background figure in the star guardian skin line.

People keep saying how Dark Star skins are supposed to be the villans, but consider this : anime protagonists need anime antagonists. Does Dark Star look like it would fit into Sailor Moon? Well no, it doesn't, but you know what does? 

Fallen Star {{champion:85}} {{champion:61}} and of couse {{champion:6}} 

Here me out. SG Janna's lore states she was once in another team of SGs. What if some evil from beyond the stars has corrupted her teammates and set them against the Light? I'm thinking normal SG skins, but with the color washed out of them or a darker theme like SG Jinx's evil pet while still retaining the "Slightly comical but thoroughly scary" theme that certain aspects of SG Jinx has. You could even go the extra mile and replace Ball with an animated... thing, like SG's pets, but of course more like a plump version of SG Jinx's evil pet, thus making Fallen star Ori a legendary, and giving her a worthwhile skin for those that aren't into Valentine's day every day of the year.

Pardon for the wall of text, but those are my thoughts/ideas
I am definitely +1ing for not just falling back to "dark star skins" :D
I wonder if Riot had to give money to sailor moon
Considering "Magical Girls Shows" is an entire genre (and therefore unaffected by Copyright) it's not likely.
I don't know, I feel like if their not going to be original with skins they should at-least release alot at once. Quantity over quality is riots moto right?

Those skins are very well made and all of them are at least 1350 RP skins, which take a lot of effort.
So no, they definetly fit Quality over Quantity instead.
I feel like you are ignorant to the fact that they use a $120 software program that basically does everything for them. What they tell you and what actually happens are very different.

I assume you are a master skin designer that could do that in seconds ?
Choosing who gets the skin, which effects/colors work best, creating new models (those spirit pets) and I don't know what else does take some time and effort. I admit that I don't know how much effort it does exactly take, but it isn't as easy as you say.

I call myself and my peers scientists. Does that mean using a hadron collider to split an atom is hard? No you just insert the atom into the pre-built collider.

Same concept with creating a champion, you input the settings into a pre-built software.

Dark star, im not really into astronomy but isnt dark star supposed to be about black holes? A thing that devours stars.

Also, dont take star guardians too literally, they are supposed to protect people.

Give more dark star skins, it's a solid concept of how every champion can be corrupted (like varus)

But think about this: Dark Stars are still...stars. My take is: they want to protect the stars too. Wouldn't Dark Stars be more in line with a renegade group of Star Guardians who didn't like their methods and are just more vicious/unorthodox? I think the enemies of the Star Guardians would be the enemies of the Dark Stars too, they just fight that enemy in different ways.

I see Dark Stars as the antiheroes of the Star Guardian universe.
Yep! The villains should be called like Star Crushers or something. IDRK...but the villains can't be guardians.
Agreed, the villains need to be something else. But what champs would they pick? :0
DARK STARS

I'm leaning to the Dark Star lineup they began for the villains, though, it is possible (unless they have a different plan in mind) that they could elaborate on the Forsaken theme. Granted, Forsaken was tailored more to Jayce vs Chosen Yi, but that was last year, and aside from Dark Star, the title best fits. (Plus, we could use more Forsaken anyway XD).
